mapper.select:
SELECT a.oypdSeq , a.oypdCate , a.oypdBrand , a.oypdName , a.oypdPrice , a.oypdDelNy , b.oyspSeq , b.oyspSalePrice , b.oyspDelNy , b.oyspTypeCd , c.originalName , c.uuidName , c.path , c.type , c.delNy
FROM oyProduct a LEFT JOIN oySaleProduct b on b.oypdSeq = a.oypdSeq LEFT JOIN oymbUploaded c on c.type = 0 AND c.pseq = a.oypdSeq
WHERE 1=1 AND oypdDelNy = 0
SELECT oymbSeq , oymbId , oymbPassword , oymbDesc , oymbName FROM oyMember WHERE 1=1 AND oymbId=#{oymbId} AND oymbPassword=#{oymbPassword}
SELECT seq , type , defaultNy , sort , originalName , uuidName , ext , size , delNy , pseq , path FROM oymbUploaded WHERE 1=1 AND pseq = #{oypdSeq} ORDER BY sort

SELECT a.oypdSeq , a.oypdCate , a.oypdBrandCd , a.oypdBrand , a.oypdName , a.oypdPrice , a.oypdCountryCd , a.oypdDistributorCd , a.oypdManufacturerCd , a.oypdVolumeWeight , a.oypdIdeal , a.oypdExpirationDate , a.oypdHowtoUse , a.oypdIngredients , a.oypdFunctionalNy , a.oypdCautions , a.oypdCustomerService , a.oypdQaStandard , a.oypdDelNy , b.oyspSalePrice , b.oyspDelNy , b.oyspSaleNy , b.oyspExclusiveNy
FROM oyProduct a LEFT JOIN oySaleProduct b ON b.oypdSeq = a.oypdSeq WHERE 1=1 AND a.oypdSeq = #{oypdSeq}
